docs.abstract: New York Times sportswriter Bill Pennington holds Donald J Trump's lewd remarks about women, captured on 2005 recording, casts negative light on on what athletes discuss behind closed doors; says he has heard distasteful boasting and crude talk in locker rooms, but never anything that could be described as about sexual assault.
